body:
## Information

- Apple Inc. is one of the most popular consumer electronics and software companies in the world. They are the largest technology company by revenue and the most profitable company in the world. Apple's products are highly popular and are used by people all over the world. Apple has been around for a long time now, and for good reason. They have always been a company that has been on the cutting edge of technology, and they are always coming up with new and innovative ways to improve the lives of their customers. They are one of the Big Five American information technology companies, alongside Alphabet, Amazon and Microsoft.

data.title: AAPL
data.description: Apple is a multinational company that engages in electronics and software.
data.author: KBVE Team

body:
## Information

- The S&P 500 index is a stock market index that tracks ~500 of the largest U.S. companies by market capitalization; the index is a product of S&P Dow Jones Indices, a joint venture of S&P Global and CME Group.

data.title: SPY
data.description: SPDR S&P 500 ETF Trust that tracks the 500 largest U.S companies through S&P Dow Jones Index.
data.author: KBVE Team

body:
## Tesla

## Info

Tesla is a multinational automotive / technology company.

data.title: TSLA
data.description: Tesla is a multinational automotive / technology company.

data.title: VG Total ETF
